info.sourceTextContent:
Vea usted por dónde, echándome mamá parte de la culpa, ha decidido darme padrastro y tirano, que, sin duda, vendrá a instalarse, dentro de poco, en esta casa...
¡Jesús, María y José! ¿Qué lío es este? No es Narcisito, es mamá quien me responde muy picada.
info.suspiciousTextContent:
See you on where, throwing some blame mother, stepfather and has decided to give me a tyrant, that will undoubtedly come to settle in a little, in this house ...
Jesus, Mary and Joseph! What is this mess? It is not narcissistic, it's Mom who answers me finely chopped
